snippet.title: NUI | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Get NUI on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1399380/NUI/
Get NUI on itch.io: https://davidpixel.itch.io/nui

NUI is a game about farewell, a minimalistic puzzle-platformer where a mysterious character carries a sword deeply tied to him. The sword must be taken to the end of the cave, while the sword limits the character movements, it can also be used as a powerful weapon. However, due to the bond with the sword distancing too much from it will damage you...

Follow the game on the our social media pages to get the latest news:
▶️Devs Website: http://davidandpixels.com/
▶️Programmer and Designer Twitter: https://twitter.com/davidpixel 
▶️Artist Twitter: https://twitter.com/ftalocianina
▶️Audio Artist Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlexBenetAudio
